description: This is a test file written in JavaScript using React Testing Library to test the Breadcrumbs component within a React application. It verifies rendering of breadcrumb items, navigation interactions, icons, and content based on different routes.

methods.name: beforeEach
methods.description: Resets window location hash before each test to initialize routing state.

methods.name: test
methods.description: Defines individual test cases to verify breadcrumb rendering, interactions, icons visibility, and routing-based content updates.
